ygData.subject: Re: Erollosi Marr?
ygData.msgSnippet: As soon as I hit level 6, I found myself a good group.  Not hard, just shouting Bard looking for group usually gives me about 4 or 5 responses. Once you have
ygData.messageBody:
As soon as I hit level 6, I found myself a good group. Not hard, just
shouting "Bard looking for group" usually gives me about 4 or 5 responses.
Once you have a good group of people you should be able to kill a lot of
yellows and reds in fairly quick succession, with you keeping the party
healed all the time.
Levels 1-4 were fairly easy to solo. Levels 4-5 were the hardest for me, as
I didn't yet have the healing ability, but if you stick it out through these
it gets a lot easier.

Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Michal Hobson [mailto:given@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 4:07 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Erollosi Marr?


From: "Michal Hobson" <given@...>

Yes, I'm Weiland. Level 4 from Queynos. Just started 3 days ago. Any
suggestion on how to level up quicker?

Weiland
